`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

#### <s class="topic-title">[[Kapha]]</s>

One of the three [[Dosha]]s in [[Ayurveda]], Kapha's qualities are wet, cold, and heavy.

**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
